duty_focus.label: Duty-focused action
duty_focus.description: Act based on dharma and responsibility, not on desired outcomes. Focus on what is right rather than what is advantageous.

detachment.label: Non-attachment to outcomes
detachment.description: Emphasize process over results. Perform actions without being attached to success or failure.

self_control.label: Leader temperament
self_control.description: Cultivate self-discipline, mental clarity, and personal integrity as foundation for leadership.

informed_choice.label: Autonomous decision-making
informed_choice.description: Make decisions with full knowledge and freedom. Understand options before choosing.

role_fit.label: Fit tasks to nature
role_fit.description: Match responsibilities to natural capabilities and temperament. Assign work according to strengths.

compassion.label: Compassionate equilibrium
compassion.description: Minimize harm in decision-making. Balance multiple stakeholder needs with empathy.

self_responsibility.label: Self-effort and example
self_responsibility.description: Leaders lead through personal action and example. Take responsibility for self-improvement.

ethical_character.label: Character traits
ethical_character.description: Filter actions through virtuous character traits. Cultivate qualities like truthfulness, courage, and patience.

consistent_duty.label: Consistent performance
consistent_duty.description: Perform duties regularly and consistently. Avoid impulsive or erratic behavior.
